text: The 2019–20 season will be Kisvárda FC's 2nd season in the OTP Bank Liga and the 17th in existence as a football club. ==First team squad== As of 14 August 2019.http://kisvardafc.hu/oldal/4/csapatok ==Transfers== ===Summer=== In: Out: http://www.nemzetisport.hu/labdarugo_nb_i/nb-i-nyari- atigazolasok-2019-2020-2700199 ===Winter=== In: Out: Source:http://www.nemzetisport.hu/labdarugo_nb_i/nb-i-teli- atigazolasok-2019-2020-2739143 ==Competitions== ===Overview=== ===Nemzeti Bajnokság I=== ====League table==== ====Results summary==== ====Results by round==== ====Matches==== ===Hungarian Cup=== ==Statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== :Last updated on 27 June 2020. |- |colspan="14"|Youth players: |- |colspan="14"|Players no longer at the club: |} ===Top scorers=== Includes all competitive matches.
